nodes.text: Hovan 99 was a planet and was the site of a deep-space supply depot during the New Republic. It was located in the Hovan system of the Senex sector.

Han Solo once operated there. The navicomputer of the Millennium Falcon started malfunctioning shortly after he and Chewbacca left that planet, which eventually resulted in the Falcon crash-landing on an unknown remote planet where Han met his death.
